headerText: Constant catching up in Frontend engineering

aboutMe.introduce: Hi! I am a self-taught frontend engineer. Due to the self-taught experience, I am confident with solving problems by myself and learning new skills quickly.
aboutMe.frontFrame: Currently developing products with tools from React + Flux/Redux ecosystem, includes React Hook and Redux-Saga, and having experience of Backbone.js and jQuery.
aboutMe.styleExp: Experienced with Sass and CSS Modules, I am working on studying Emotion to improve my web styling skiils.
aboutMe.buildEnv: Knowing the development process: I have the experience of setting up webpack, Grunt + RequireJS and GitLab CI/CD YAML files.

descriptions: Migrate package manager from Bower to npm
